name: .FXCPROJ File Extension
summary: Learn about .FXCPROJ files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Project file created by FX Composer, an IDE used for creating shaders, which define how to render graphics on hardware GPUs; may contain references to 3D object files (.DAE, .3DS, .FBX, .OBJ, .X) as well as specifications for how the 3D objects appear; supports HLSL, COLLADA FX Cg, and CgFX languages.

content: FX Composer projects can target multiple different platforms, including Microsoft DirectX, OpenGL, and the Mac, Windows, and Linux operating systems.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
